subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Mikael Samuelsson broke out of a slump with two unassisted goals and Chris Osgood made 19 saves to help Detroit stifle the Pittsburgh Penguins in Game 1 of the Stanley Cup Finals.
snippet: Mikael Samuelsson broke out of a slump with two unassisted goals and Chris Osgood made 19 saves to help Detroit stifle the Pittsburgh Penguins in Game 1 of the Stanley Cup Finals.
